dcterms:creator: J. S. Garofolo
dcterms:description: TIMIT is a speech dataset which contains 16 kHz recordings of 630 speakers of eight major dialects of American English, each reading ten phonetically rich sentences. It amounts to 6300 total recordings splits approximately in 3.94 hours of audio for training and 1.43 hours of audio for testing.
dcterms:title: TIMIT

dcterms:creator: V. Panayotov
G. Chen
D. Povey
S. Khudanpur
dcterms:description: LibriSpeech is a dataset consisting of readings of public domain audio books amounting to approximately 1000 hours of audio. The data is derived from the LibriVox project.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech

dcterms:creator: J. Kahn
M. Riviere
W. Zheng
E. Kharitonov
Q. Xu
P. Mazare
J. Karadayi
V. Liptchinsky
R. Collobert
C. Fuegen
dcterms:description: LibriLight is a subset of LibriSpeech created as an automatic speech transcription (ASR) benchmark with limited or no supervision.
dcterms:title: LibriLight
